name: Christian Dating: Chat, Mingle & Meet Singles
description: Welcome To CMate  CMate is the largest and most trusted Christian dating app helping Christian singles in the world find friends, love and long-term relationships. Outside of church and work, its often difficult to find places to meet other single Christians - online Christian dating solves this problem. CMate lets you meet other Single Christians who are also looking for a relationship. Here we believe a God-centered relationship is worth the wait.  Unlike other Christian dating apps, we understand the importance of your faith and endeavor to match you with Christian singles who share your values. So CMate has unique features for Christian singles:  Search - Use filter easily to find lots of like-minded christian singles Match - Swipe and find singles with same faith Message - Chat with new people & check connections Show - Share your christian life and your church  Are you single christian catholic, baptist (or singles in other denominations) and seeking someone who shares your beliefs? Then youve come to the right place!
